Pokemon Let's Go

わたしの　名前は　(オーキド) My name is Oak. G_PokePika0003
みんなからは　(ポケモン)　博士と　したわれて　おるよ People affectionately refer to me as the Pokémon Professor. G_PokePika0004
この　世界には　ポケットモンスターと　呼ばれる　生きもの　たちが　いたるところに　住んでいる！ This world is inhabited far and wide by creatures called Pokémon. G_PokePika0005
その　(ポケモン)　という　生きものをひとは　かわいがったり　勝負　させたり…… And if you want to know how people tend to interact with these Pokémon...Well, some people keep them as companions. Others have them do battle… G_PokePika0006
そして…… As for myself... G_PokePika0007

リングを　狙って　投げましょう！ Aim your ball so it’ll hit within the two rings, and watch out, because some Pokémon move! G_PokePika0114

そう！　この　教室では　黒板や　本ですね！ That’s right! In this classroom, you can find it on the blackboard or in books! G_PokePika0316

どの　項目を　みますか？ Which topic do you want to read? G_PokePika0319
ねむり　やけど　どく　こおり　まひ　やめる Falling asleep　Getting burned　Being poisoned　Being frozen　Paralysis　Never mind G_PokePika0320
寝てしまうと　その　間は　攻撃　できません！ “If a Pokémon falls asleep, it will be unable to attack till it wakes. G_PokePika0321
戦い　終わっても　寝たまま　ねむけざましで　目が　覚めます “It will stay asleep after battle. “Use an Awakening to wake it up.” G_PokePika0322
やけどは　体力が　減って　こうげきりょくが　下がって　しまいます！ “When a Pokémon is burned, its Attack is lowered and it will steadily lose HP. G_PokePika0324
戦い　終わっても　やけどは　残ります　また　やけどなおしで　治ります “This lingers even after battle. Use a Burn Heal to cure it.” G_PokePika0325
どくを　くらうと　体力が　減って　いきます “If a Pokémon is poisoned, it’ll steadily lose HP. G_PokePika0327
戦い　終わっても　どくは　残りますが　どくけしで　消えます！ “Poisoning won’t disappear after the battle, so heal it with an Antidote.” G_PokePika0328
凍って　しまうと　まったく　動けなく　なります！ “If a Pokémon is frozen, it becomes helplessly immobile. G_PokePika0330
戦い　終わっても　凍ってます　こおりなおしで　溶かさないと　(ポケモン)が　かわいそう “It stays frozen even after the battle ends. Use an Ice Heal to thaw it out.” G_PokePika0331
まひすると　技が　時々　でなく　なり　すばやさも　下がって　しまいます！ “Paralysis reduces Speed and may prevent a Pokémon from using moves in battle. G_PokePika0333
戦い　終わっても　まひは　残ります　また　まひなおしで　治ります “And paralysis doesn’t go away after the battle ends, either. Use a Paralyze Heal to treat it.” G_PokePika0334

バッジを　もってる　数が　多い　ほど　ひとから　もらった　(ポケモン)が　強くても　いうことを　ききます Strong Pokémon from other Trainers will listen to you if you have enough Badges! G_PokePika0842
１つ　持ってると　レベル２０まで　２つ　持ってると　レベル３０まで　と　１０ずつ　レベルが　増えていきます The level limit increases by 10 levels for each Badge you have. If you have one Badge, Pokémon up to Lv. 20 will listen to you...if you have two Badges, Pokémon up to Lv. 30 will listen to you... and so on. G_PokePika0843
全部の　バッジが　あれば　全ての　(ポケモン)が　いうことを　ききます Once you have all the Badges, Pokémon of any level will give you their full attention! G_PokePika0844
